project.title: Liberation
project.description: Jack was wandering through the depths of the forest, not realising how far he was from his home. Nature was beckoning and attracting the hero. The soft whisper of rain on the leaves was singing an autumn ode, inviting to oblivion and detachment from the earthly world. It was at that very moment when Jack realised his nature and liberated it into the wild. The old Jack has never been seen again…

project.title: E-commerce & Blog Interface
project.description: I present to your attention the design concept of an online store combined with a blog. I wanted to pay tribute to a beautiful girl, a ceramist - Marina Lozova. I did not find anything better than to make this concept for her store.

about.title: Experienced, executive and with  sense of style UI/UX designer
skills: I know and work in Figma, Adobe Photoshop / Illustrator/ After Effect, Axure
I use User Research, COM, User Flow, Wireframe's, Prototype Testing, MVP
I am developed guidelines, designed desktop and mobile app
I understand the specifics of working in large companies and work well in teams
Add skills include 2D illustration, animation, freehand drawing (painting and graphics)
about.message: I like to solve complex user tasks with elements of organization and management.  carefully work out design concepts, are focused on results, I learn quickly.

contacts.title: Let’s connect!
contacts.message: I’d love to hear from you; whether you want to learn more about my services, want to collaborate on a project, or simply just want to say hello.
contacts.instructions: You can fill out the form or get in touch with me in Telegram, WhatsApp or by email
